_sText:
Plot:

This map is minigame map and the aim is to bhop as long as you can go. After deveryone has got weapon you will be teleported to arena where you can kill each other. In the middle of arena is nade spawner.

If you are so good bunnyhopper, you might get to the end and choose one of the three doors with different weapons. Also you will get some extra health.


Instructions:

1. Download the .rar-file (Around 2 MB, unpacked +10MB)
2. Extract anywhere
3. Move the .bsp to your maps folder.
Usually located at:
C:\Program Files\Steam\Steamapps\Steamname\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps
4. Play.

The is final version.

Other:
The inspiration to this map came from mg_bhop_battle made by xGrandx. After playing that map I wanted to create something with same idea.
